caption.center: Hunter CRENSHAW, Appellant v. SPECIAL ADMINISTRATOR OF THE ESTATE OF

opinion.opinion_text: PER CURIAM ORDERS PETITION FOR REHEARING: Petition for rehearing was denied today in the following case.Page 1
